question: what investor has invested in more than 20 sf-based companies in 2024
expected_path_description: Filter organizations WHERE region/city matches SF (need to discover exact value), join to deals WHERE year = 2024, join to institutional_investments, GROUP BY investor organization, HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT company) > 20, return investor names and counts.
expected_answer: Y Combinator, Sequoia Capital, General Catalyst, and Andreessen Horowitz have invested in more than 20 SF-based companies in 2024

question: how many founders went to Stanford Business School
expected_path_description: Find Stanford in linkedin_education using SEARCH(linkedin_education, 'stanford business school') OR SEARCH(linkedin_education, 'stanford'), join to linkedin_person_education, join to people, filter WHERE is_founder = TRUE via organization_associations, COUNT distinct people.

question: what stanford business school alumni have been part of companies that have raised more than 10B
expected_path_description: Find Stanford alumni via linkedin_education → linkedin_person_education → people, join to organization_associations, join to organizations WHERE total_raised > 10000 (values in millions, so 10000 = $10B), find distinct people.
expected_answer: Ron Gabrisko of Databricks and Sarah Friar of OpeanAI have been part of companies that have raised more than 10B

question: how many google deepmind alumn are currently founders of companies
expected_path_description: Find 'Google DeepMind' in linkedin_company join to linkedin_positions to find people who worked there, join to organization_associations WHERE is_founder = TRUE AND is_current = TRUE, COUNT distinct people.
expected_answer: 10 Google DeepMind alumni are currently founders of companies

question: how many current CEOs previously worked at meta and curent company has more than 10 employees and what is their linkedin
expected_path_description: Discover Meta in linkedin_company using SEARCH(linkedin_company, 'meta'), join to linkedin_positions to find people who worked there (end_date IS NOT NULL for former), join to organization_associations WHERE is_ceo=TRUE and organization has more than 10 employee (11-10k)
expected_answer: Koichi Yamaguchi (https://www.linkedin.com/in/koichi-yamaguchi-bb86576) and Maria Zhang (https://www.linkedin.com/in/mariarenhuizhang) are currently CEOs of companies larger than 10 people

question: what companies raised the most rounds in 2024
expected_path_description: Query deals WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date)=2024, join to organizations WHERE is_investor=FALSE, GROUP BY organization_id, COUNT(DISTINCT deal id) AS round_count, ORDER BY round_count DESC, return company names and counts
expected_answer: GalaxEye, Enifer, Country Delight all raised 5 rounds in 2024

question: what was the largest seed round in 2024 and who invested and provide an article source
expected_path_description: Query deals WHERE financing_type='SEED' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM d.date)=2024, ORDER BY size_usd DESC LIMIT 1, join to organizations WHERE is_investor=FALSE to get company name, join to institutional_investments WHERE lead_investor=TRUE, join to organizations WHERE is_investor=TRUE to get lead investor name.
expected_answer: The largest seed round in 2024 was $220M raised with no lead investors (https://www.finsmes.com/2024/05/h-raises-220m-in-seed-funding.html)

question: for company Paradigm Health, list all rounds, the date, valuation, lead investor, and article source
expected_path_description: Discover Paradigm organization ID using WHERE (LOWER(name) LIKE '%paradigm%' OR LOWER(short_description) LIKE '%paradigm health%') since company name may differ from marketing name. Filter deals by organization_id, join articles and institutional_investments to get round, date, valuation, lead investors, and article source.
expected_answer: Jan 29th 2023 Series A $203M led by ARCH Venture Partners and General Catalyst (https://www.finsmes.com/2023/01/paradigm-raises-203m-in-series-a-funding.html). Dec 4 2025 Series B $78B led by ARCH Venture Partners (https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/paradigm-health-raises-78-million-series-b-to-make-clinical-trials-part-of-routine-care-across-the-us-and-globally-302632924.html). Valuations not disclosed in either.

question: how many deals did https://www.techstars.com/ fund in 2023
expected_path_description: Find Techstars using domain = 'techstars.com' join to deals and filter year = 2023, COUNT distinct deals.

question: Calculate what % of tech stars's seed investments from 2023 get a Series A follow-on from techstars
expected_path_description: Find Techstars using domain = 'techstars.com' with is_investor = TRUE. Create CTE for seed investments: join institutional_investments to organizations (investor) to deals, filter financing_type = 'SEED' and YEAR(date) = 2023, group by company_id to get first seed date. Create CTE for Series A investments: same joins, filter financing_type = 'SERIES_A', group by company_id to get first Series A date. LEFT JOIN seed companies to Series A companies where Series A date > seed date. Count total seed companies, count those with follow-on Series A, calculate percentage.
expected_answer: Seed companies (Techstars entities participated in a SEED round in 2023): 30, of those, companies where Techstars later participated in a SERIES A: 1, percentage with Techstars follow-on into Series A: 3.33%
